title: Add a UTC clock on Decentraland world ?
body:
> by 0x919c0e02cab272b50d0cfa2c70a653ce96f589a6 (Tei)

For events, for different settings, because we all come from a different country,

and all the time we have to look to convert our time to UTC, why shouldn't we

have a clock, on Decentraland, the same as UTC time?

Vote "YES" for get a nice UTC clock on Decentraland

Vote "NO" if you don t want a UTC clock on Decentraland

- YES
- NO


**[Vote on this proposal on the Decentraland DAO](https://governance.decentraland.org/en/proposal/?id=cf6bfbb0-d9c4-11eb-9110-69b867ba991b)**
author: 0x5E23D08324f017d5425e59A2782C9ae27aCE0958
